name: pontoon-addon
description: Tools for Pontoon and its integration into the browser.
author: Michal Stanke <mstanke@mozilla.cz>

scripts.mozilla:build: echo 'Packaging for Mozilla based browsers.' && web-ext build -s ./src -i 'packages/*/src/' 'packages/*/public/' '**/package.json' '**/node_modules/' 'packages/*/coverage/' -a ./build/web-ext/mozilla
scripts.chrome:build: echo 'Packaging for Chromium based browsers.' && bash ./scripts/build-chrome.sh
scripts.build: npm-run-all packages:build build:lint mozilla:build chrome:build doc
scripts.clean-build: yarn clean-all && yarn install --frozen-lockfile && npm-run-all bootstrap build
